alert.note: Alert for Inland Kleberg (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Corpus Christi (Corpus Cristi, Victoria and Laredo)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 16 at 2:28PM CDT by NWS Corpus Christi
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Kleberg County through 315 PM CDT... At 227 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Ricardo, or 7 miles south of Kingsville, moving southeast at 5 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Kingsville, Ricardo and Riviera. This includes US Highway 77 between mile markers 696 and 708. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
